short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect & Chat With Others Watching The Same Content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
cSociety is a browser extension that adds a chat window to your streaming page enabling you to chat to others all around the world who are watching the same show/movie or content in real-time across major streaming platforms, with our unique "Watch Together" feature - Never watch alone again!

*Available on Chrome and Microsoft Edge*

HOW IT WORKS

1. Install the cSociety extension

2. Go to your chosen streaming platform

3. Choose any content you would like to watch and start playing the video. The cSociety extension will load automatically ( Please pin the icon - depending on your browser you may need to click the icon to activate)

4. Use the “guest” login to experience cSociety as a guest user OR Sign up for a FREE account by going to www.csociety.co > Sign up (you'll get access to exclusive features such as uploading an avatar and creating a bio for your profile) & select a language 

5. You’ll be redirected to the lobby where you can see the Top 5 most popular shows everyone is watching & join the conversation. Check out our “WATCH TOGETHER” feature which lets you connect & chat to others currently watching the same show, movie or content in real time. You can also join any genre chat room and engage with other users.  


COMPATIBLE WITH: Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV+, Disney+, Hulu, & many more
